tooltip.voided_enlightenment.knife_depre:
This implementation of the Adamantite Knife is superseded by Voided Enlightenment's implementation.
Upgrade it by placing it in a crafting grid.
tooltip.voided_enlightenment.knife_unsup:
This implementation of the Adamantite Knife is unsupported by Voided Enlightenment.
Install Farmer's Delight to be able upgrade it to a functional knife.
